chart_description: The Bandwidth chart provides information on the amount of data that 'eth0' network interface is sending and receiving within the Kubernetes container group.

dimension_descriptions.received: The rate at which data is being received (in kilobits per second) on the 'eth0' network interface.
dimension_descriptions.sent: The rate at which data is being sent (in kilobits per second) on the 'eth0' network interface.
